articles.author: Umar Shakir
articles.title: Apple's standalone Passwords app syncs across iOS, iPad, Mac, and Windows - The Verge
articles.description: Apple is rolling out a new Passwords app to manage logins and sync information across platforms, including Microsoft Windows, via the iCloud for Windows app.
articles.content:
